page.title: 02CHURCHES IN THE BRIDGE AREA
page.content: The names of the three churches are:St Peter's Bridge,St. Mary's Patrixbourne and St. Peter's Bekesbourne.The churches are built of flint and stone. The Vicar's name is Revd. Raymond Gilbert A.K.C.He looks after the three parishes. The Vicarage is at 23, High Street, Bridge. Bekesbourne Church has a tower, Patrixbourne and Bridge Churches have spires. Patrixbourne Church is famous for the Norman doorway and Swiss enamelled glass window panes. Bekesbourne Church is kept locked up because it is away from the road. Bridge Junior Church is held at Bridge Methodist Church every Sunday at 9-30am except the first Sunday of each month. Junior Church is run by Mrs Pike,Mrs Spencer and Mrs.Wraight. There is no Junior Church at Patrixbourne and Bekesbourne.
